Statute.Title: Mandatory reporting of Internet child pornography by persons who provide an Internet service, An Act respecting the
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Déclaration obligatoire de la pornographie juvénile sur Internet par les personnes qui fournissent des services Internet, Loi concernant la)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2011, c. 4 (assent: 23.03.2011), the Act in force 08.12.2011 see SI/2011-110

CIF, 2024, c. 23, s. 12 in force on the first anniversary of the day on which the Act to amend the Criminal Code and to make consequential amendments to other Acts (child sexual abuse and exploitation material) receives royal assent see s. 14 (10.10.2025)
